resources.string: "Welcome to Find device! You can use this service to locate, lock, or erase data on your device if it's lost."
"Welcome to Find device! You can use this service to locate, lock, or erase data on your device if it's lost."

Welcome to Xiaomi Cloud services! You can use Xiaomi Cloud to sync your messages, call history, contacts, notes, Browser settings, songs, photos and videos, WLAN settings, recordings, Home screen layout, apps, calendar events, Blocklist items, and App vault across all connected devices.

Welcome to Xiaomi Cloud services! You can use Xiaomi Cloud to sync your messages, call history, contacts, notes, Browser settings, songs, photos and videos, WLAN settings, recordings, Home screen layout, apps, calendar events, Blocklist items, and App vault across all connected devices. Access the things you sync from any browser at i.mi.com." An outgoing SMS message may be required to activate this service. Your carrier will charge you for this message. When you switch your SIM card, a message may be sent automatically to reactivate this feature. We shall protect your personal information in accordance with the relevant laws, regulations, and privacy policies. To be able to work normally, Xiaomi Cloud needs to connect to the internet and requires the following permissions in order to collect your personal information: • Calendar: For syncing events • Accessing SMS: For syncing messages • Accessing MMS: For syncing messages • Accessing contacts: For syncing contacts • Editing contacts: For syncing contacts • Storage: For saving items on your device (e.g. images, videos, songs) If you don't agree to grant such permissions or share and upload your personal information, you won't be able to use these services. You can choose to uninstall this app, sign out, or restrict permissions in the Settings in such cases. Read and agree to our "User Agreement and Privacy Policy b"efore using Xiaomi Cloud. "

"Welcome to Find device! You can use this service to locate, lock, or erase data on your device if it's lost. You can go to "i.mi.com" to locate, lock, or reset it. We shall protect your personal information in accordance with the relevant laws, regulations, and privacy policies. To be able to work normally, Find device needs to connect to the internet and requires the following permissions in order to collect your personal information: • Accessing device info: For identifying your device • Location: For locating your device and switching to the lost mode If you don't agree to grant such permissions or share and upload your personal information, you won't be able to use these services. You can choose to uninstall this app, sign out, or restrict permissions in the Settings in such cases. Read and agree to our" User Agreement and Privacy Policy "before using Find device. "

"Welcome to Find device! You can use this service to locate, lock, or erase data on your device if it's lost. You can go to "i.mi.com" to locate, lock, or reset it.
